name: CloudNucleus Technologies
tag_list: disk-backup-software, disk-drive-backup, backup-and-recovery, data-backup, disk-imaging, disk-clone, virtual-recovery, windows-drive-backup, server-backup, server-migration, windows-disk-backup, virtual-machine-backup, migrate-virtual-machine, move-virtua
overview:
Welcome to CloudNucleus

CloudNucleus is built by storage industry innovators with successful track records of building profitable companies. Cloud Nucleus is headquartered in Chennai, India with sales offices across the world.

StorCube is our flag-ship product that provides software-based backup and disaster recovery solutions. Over the few months, CloudNucleus has released a new backup and disaster recovery solution that integrate data protection with virtualization and cloud storage to provide the most cost effective, efficient and complete disaster recovery solution for SMB and SOHO.

At CloudNucleus, we thrive on customer satisfaction. We love to see a fully satisfied customer and thrilled to get repeat business or great referrals. Our growth has been through our customers referrals.Â 

We love our employees. They are our single largest asset. We believe when our employees grow their value, our value grows. Thus, we are committed to create the best workplaces wherever we are.Â 

[Read more] (http://www.cloudnucleus.com)

milestones.description: StorCube Data Protection and Disaster Recovery  Software v12 is now available
